# Genie.ph: Custom Cake Marketplace in Cebu

> Genie.ph is the leading online marketplace for custom cakes in Cebu, Philippines. Connect with top local artisan bakers, get instant pricing via AI, and order personalized cakes for any occasion.

## Main Sections

- [Home](https://genie.ph/): Main marketplace interface to search and browse cakes.
- [Design Gallery](https://genie.ph/designs): Browse thousands of custom cake designs.
- [Cake Price Calculator](https://genie.ph/cake-price-calculator): Instant AI-powered pricing tool for custom cakes.
- [About Us](https://genie.ph/about): Learn about our mission to support local bakers.
- [Blog](https://genie.ph/blog): Guides on cake ordering, pricing, and trends in Cebu.

## Key Facts

- **Service Area**: Cebu City, Mandaue, Lapu-Lapu, Talisay, and surrounding areas.
- **Services**: Custom Cake Design, Instant Pricing, Online Ordering, Delivery.
- **Products**: Birthday Cakes, Wedding Cakes, Bento Cakes, Cupcakes.
- **Features**: AI Design Analysis, Direct Baker Connection, Secure Payments.
